description: Discover a new take on the classic brownie with these fudgy chocolate and raspberry muffins.
name: Raspberry & Chocolate Brownie Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk in eggs and vanilla. Sift over flour, cocoa and salt. Add buttermilk and whisk until smooth and combined. Add remaining choc bits and half the raspberries. Fold through. Divide mixture evenly among muffin pan holes then gently press remaining raspberries into tops. Bake for 20 minutes or until slightly firm to touch. Stand in pan for 10 minutes. Serve warm.

Whisk in eggs and vanilla. Sift over flour, cocoa and salt. Add buttermilk and whisk until smooth and combined. Add remaining choc bits and half the raspberries. Fold through. Divide mixture evenly among muffin pan holes then gently press remaining raspberries into tops. Bake for 20 minutes or until slightly firm to touch. Stand in pan for 10 minutes. Serve warm.
